name: The Lost Treasure (tukanoid, Octavian Buzatu, Ivco, rennaiscentist_dragon)
name_original: The Lost Treasure (tukanoid, Octavian Buzatu, Ivco, rennaiscentist_dragon)
description:
The Lost Treasure (tukanoid, Octavian Buzatu, Ivco, rennaiscentist_dragon) is an adventure-platformer game developed by tukanoid, Octavian Buzatu and Ivco. It was originally released in 2021.
The Lost Treasure (tukanoid, Octavian Buzatu, Ivco, rennaiscentist_dragon) is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
